content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If the expat is currently on the bench no matter the reason, there is a possibility that the Labor Contract extension will only be made for 1 year, regardless of his/her job title, level or duration of employment at EPAM Belarus.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
